data.project_description: Krisumi Corporation is poised to unveil the extraordinary Krisumi Waterfall Residences, a luxurious residential haven in Gurgaon that promises to leave a lasting impression. This groundbreaking collaboration between Sumitomo Corp, a renowned Japanese entity, and Krishna Group, a distinguished Indian organization, combines their collective expertise and cutting-edge technology to create a truly unique living experience. As the first project of its kind in India to involve a Japanese company, Krisumi Waterfall Residences pioneers the art of Japanese living, seamlessly integrating it into Indian homes. This innovative residency promises to set a new standard for luxury and sophistication in the Indian real estate market.
projectRedefine_Connectivity: Located in Sector 36A on Dwarka Expressway Gurgaon
data.meta_description: Krisumi Waterfall Residences Offers 2/3 LDK with World Class Amenities in Sector 36A Gurgaon. Krisumi Corporation is the First Indo-Japanese Real Estate Project
data.meta_title: Krisumi Waterfall Residences - Sector 36A Dwarka Expressway Gurgaon
data.AboutDeveloper: An enterprising collaboration between Sumitomo Corporation, Japan and Krishna Group, India, Krisumi is a convergence of Kriya, meaning creation in Sanskrit, and Sumi, the Japanese word for fine living. Our endeavour is to conceptualize, design and build homes which are characterized by the highest standards of Japanese craftsmanship, in sizes that complement today’s ever-evolving way of life. By unifying Japanese design aesthetics with the warmth of Indian hospitality, we at Krisumi are giving shape to architectural masterpieces that are spectacular in form, and highly practical in function.

highlight.highlight_Point: Krisumi Corporation launching soon new project Krisumi City Gurgaon Waterfall Residences with world class amenities.
1st phase to have over 450 apartments (1.2 million sq ft) and will be completed in 4-5 years.
Construction of the 1st phase of the project expected to commence this year.
Township spread over 65 acres will be developed in 7-8 phases with around 5,000 apartments (18 million sq ft approx) over 10 years.
The project will also feature a high-end retail mall, education institutions, a premium hotel and premium office spaces.
The master plan and architectural design of Krisumi City Gurgaon is developed by world renowned Japanese design firm NIKKEN SEKKEI.

This is the story of Signature Global Titanium SPR in Sector 71, Gurugram. Reflecting the attributes of the metal it is named after, this project represents robustness and timeless endurance, providing a sanctuary of enduring quality and timeless elegance.

data.AboutDeveloper: Signature Global Titanium SPR is an exquisite real estate project developed by Signature Global, a brand synonymous with excellence and innovation in the realty sector. Signature Global stands for 'Superbness in the Trinity Of Men, Materials, and Money,' embodying the company's core values of quality, timely delivery, and superior craftsmanship. Signature Global is renowned for its groundbreaking and unparalleled concepts, offering multi-dimensional real estate solutions and exceptional service standards. The company is committed to creating state-of-the-art real estate masterpieces and consistently attracts the best talent in the industry. With rich experience in the real estate domain, Signature Global leverages a network of elite intermediaries, financial institutions, high-net-worth individuals, and some of the most reputable designers in India.

data.project_description: M3M Altitude, situated in Sector 65, Gurgaon, is a paragon of luxury living, offering a sublime residential experience. These sumptuous apartments are crafted to meet the refined tastes of the modern homeowner, harmoniously balancing elegance, comfort, and convenience. The development boasts an array of world-class amenities, including a cutting-edge fitness center, an opulent swimming pool, a stylish clubhouse, and exquisitely landscaped gardens. Strategically located, M3M Altitude ensures seamless connectivity to major thoroughfares, upscale shopping centers, gourmet dining options, and entertainment venues. With its robust security measures and eco-friendly practices, this development redefines the pinnacle of luxury living, making it the ultimate haven for discerning individuals.

data.project_description: Ganga Realty Fusion 85, situated in Sector 85, Gurgaon, is a masterpiece of contemporary architecture and innovative design. This iconic development features sleek high-rise towers nestled amidst lush greenery and beautifully landscaped gardens, creating a tranquil oasis for its residents. The apartments are thoughtfully designed to maximize natural light and ventilation, offering breathtaking views of the surrounding landscape. The strategic location of Ganga Apartments in Sector 85, Gurgaon, is a significant factor in its popularity. The sector's seamless connectivity to major roads and highways, including National Highway 48 and the Dwarka Expressway, ensures effortless access to Delhi and other key areas of Gurgaon, making it a coveted destination for discerning homeowners.

data.project_description: In the heart of Delhi, a new commercial horizon is unfolding. Omaxe Dwarka Shopping Center is a prestigious business project that promises to revolutionize the city's retail and office landscape. This iconic development features a diverse range of premium dining options, retail outlets, and office spaces, all supported by advanced amenities and multi-level parking. With its strategic location in Dwarka, one of Delhi's most rapidly growing commercial districts, Omaxe Dwarka Shopping Center offers unparalleled opportunities for business growth and success. The Omaxe Group, a pioneering real estate developer, has invested INR 2100 crore in this ambitious project, which also includes the development of a state-of-the-art sports complex and retail center. Set to become a landmark destination in the nation's capital, Omaxe Dwarka Shopping Center is poised to redefine the future of commerce in Delhi.
projectRedefine_Connectivity: 15 minutes drive from Indira Gandhi International (IGI) Airport.
projectRedefine_Business: 6 km away from the Gurgaon border
projectRedefine_Education: Located within 5 km from Vegas Mall And hospitals like Ayushman Hospital, and Aakash Healthcare Super Speciality Hospital.

data.project_description: Unleash your business potential in the heart of Delhi with Omaxe Dwarka Shopping Center, a revolutionary commercial project by Omaxe Group, a trailblazer in real estate development. This iconic complex offers a dynamic blend of fine dining, retail experiences, office spaces, and multi-level parking, setting a new standard for business and entertainment in the capital's commercial hub. With an investment of INR 2100 crore, Omaxe Dwarka Delhi is poised to transform the city's landscape, featuring a state-of-the-art sports complex and retail center in the strategic location of Dwarka, making it a prime destination for business expansion and growth.

This esteemed project offers opulent 3, 4, and 5 BHK apartments that redefine the benchmarks of luxury and convenience. Nestled in the heart of Sector 56, these apartments provide a unique lifestyle that harmoniously blends luxurious surroundings with cutting-edge technology. Surrounded by lush greenery, residents can indulge in a comfortable and open living environment, complemented by thoughtfully designed floor plans that prioritize natural light and fresh air.

data.project_discripation: Ashiana Amarah, located in Sector 93, Gurugram, offers luxurious 3BHK and 4BHK apartments across a sprawling landscape. These residences boast panoramic views and exceptional ventilation, allowing natural light to fill every room. Designed for a sophisticated lifestyle, Ashiana Amarah includes numerous well-thought-out amenities. This pre-launch project promises a comfortable and serene living experience, perfectly suited for families seeking a prestigious address. Embrace a life of elegance and tranquility in a location that enhances daily living, nestled within the vibrant cityscape of Gurgaon, the dynamic city between cities.

data.AboutDeveloper: This journey of spreading joy in your life by helping you find your perfect home does not just end by handing over the keys to you. Stepping into your new home is just the beginning of our beautiful pervasive bonding. Every day and in every way, we strive to create an environment of trust and hope to keep you smiling always.We see ourselves not as a real estate company, but as a service provider. We see ourselves not as builder of homes, but as a builder of happy communities. We believe that we are not in the real estate business but in the 'happiness' business. We measure success not by the numbers in our balance sheet, but by the width of your smile. No wonder, we are rated as India’s Top 10 Realty brand and #1 Senior Living Homes brand. A fact that is endorsed by the 15,000+ families, for whom home means Ashiana.

data.project_description: Discover luxurious and private living in the serene ambiance of Sector 103, Dwarka Expressway, Gurgaon with Godrej Sector 103 Gurgaon, the latest residential offering from Godrej Properties. This ultra-luxury township promises easy accessibility to Delhi, IGI Airport, and National Highway-8. It features spacious 2 BHK, 3 BHK, and 4 BHK apartments with expansive balconies, offering stunning garden views and ultra-modern amenities. Ideal for those seeking a blend of tranquility and convenience, Godrej Sector 103 Gurgaon is set to redefine contemporary living standards in Gurgaon.

data.AboutDeveloper: The Godrej Group comprises of a varied business portfolio that includes real estate development, fast moving consumer goods, advanced engineering, home appliances, furniture, security, and agri-care. While a large number of our businesses are privately held, the combined market cap of our publicly listed entities is in excess of USD 15 billion. Ranked as the 2nd most trusted Indian brand, an annual revenue of USD 5 billion, and an estimated 1.1 billion customers across the world that use one or another Godrej product every day, the Godrej Group is amongst India's most diversified and trusted conglomerates.

data.project_description: Nestled along Gurgaon's vibrant Golf Course Extension Road, Tarc Ishva Apartments epitomizes luxurious row housing living. With over 500 meticulously designed apartments, this development offers a secure, green environment enriched with top-tier amenities. Embodying a holistic living ethos, Tarc Ishva integrates expertise from various sectors to enhance resident experience. Each unit boasts contemporary features, ensuring a blend of comfort and sophistication. Located near thriving residential zones, it promises unparalleled convenience and connectivity, with Netaji Subhash Marg linking directly to the Delhi-Gurgaon Expressway

projectRedefine_Entertainment: Multiple business hubs and Kadarpur CRPF Camp is in close proximity.

data.AboutDeveloper: TARC Group is a well-established real estate developer that was founded in 1969. The company has a significant presence in the real estate sector across various states in India. TARC Group has successfully developed a wide range of medium to large-scale properties. Their residential projects are a testament to the developer's unwavering commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction. TARC Group's impressive portfolio and dedicated team make them a trustworthy name in the real estate industry.

data.project_description:
In sector 103, near Gurgaon’s Dwarka Expressway, you’ll find Whiteland Urban Resort. This is a fancy living proje­ct designed by Whiteland Corporation 103 Gurgaon. There are 3 BHK and 4 BHK super luxury apartme­nts on the plan.

There’s a lot to like­, with first-rate amenities and fair prices. We aim to give you more than a house at Whiteland Urban Resort Sector 103 Gurgaon. it should feel like a dream vacation home. They use top quality materials and spe­ed up the building process to make­ sure everything’s just right. You won’t have­ to fuss over parking – there’s a spot re­served for each home. The property has special towe­rs, offering open views on thre­e sides from most apartments, luxury fe­atures, and deck balconies. The­ height of the ceilings re­mind you of villas. And one of the best parts of prope­rty 103? It’s close to both Delhi and Gurgaon. It’s the ide­al place to live, really.

data.project_description: Puri Diplomatic Greens is a luxurious residential complex in Sector 111, Dwarka Expressway, Gurgaon, developed by Puri Constructions. Spanning 20 acres, it offers premium 3 BHK and 4 BHK apartments, penthouses, and villas. Key amenities include a state-of-the-art clubhouse, swimming pool, sports facilities, children's play area, and 24x7 security. Strategically located near IGI Airport, it provides excellent connectivity and a serene living environment with lush greenery and modern conveniences.
